name: Funimation
description:
Subscribe to FunimationNow and take your love of anime onto the big screen with this PlayStation® app! Watch the largest collection of English-dubbed anime online featuring iconic classics and the hottest new shows of the season available in English sooner than ever.

- Unlimited access to hundreds of English-dubbed anime shows
- Watch HD shows, movies, OVAs, and extras completely ad-free
- Exclusive English SimulDubs™ within weeks of their Japanese broadcast
- Support original Japanese creators by getting your anime from an official source

App Features

- Episode progress sync across devices
- Marathoning/Auto-play next episode
- Queue sync across devices
- Support for PlayStation®3, PlayStation®4, and PlayStation®Vita

1 player
DUALSHOCK®3
